$!If you see debris or litter on an A road or motorway in England, Scotland or Wales, report it by phone.$!

%Never use your [mobile phone while driving.](/using-mobile-phones-when-driving-the-law "Using mobile phones when driving")%

##Motorways and main roads

$C
**Highways Agency (England)**   
0300 123 5000  
24 hours, 7 days a week
$C

$C
**Traffic Scotland**  
0800 028 1414  
24 hours, 7 days a week
$C

$C
**Traffic Wales**  
0845 602 6020  
24 hours, 7 days a week
$C

In Northern Ireland, contact the [Department for Regional Development](http://www.nidirect.gov.uk/report-a-problem-with-the-roads "Contact the Department for Regional Development"){:rel="external"}

##Local roads
Report [litter and debris](/reporting-road-obstruction "Report litter and debris")  and [abandoned vehicles](/report-abandoned-vehicle "Report an abandoned vehicle") to your local council.
overview: Reporting litter or debris on trunk roads and motorways across the UK - phone numbers, website
title: Report debris and litter on motorways and main roads
